Added interface react.Closeable.

Removed Methods
Canvas canvas() Returns the canvas into which drawing may be done.
void destroy() Destroys the layer and image, removing them from the containing widget.
void prepare(float, float) Ensures that the canvas image is at least the specified dimensions and cleared to all transparent pixels.
void prepare(IDimension) Ensures that the canvas image is at least the specified dimensions and cleared to all transparent pixels.
void renderText(Plain) Prepares the canvas and renders the supplied text at 0, 0 using the given config.
 

Added Methods
Canvas begin() Starts a drawing session into this glyph's canvas.
void close() Disposes the layer and image, removing them from the containing widget.
void end() Completes a drawing sesion into this glyph's canvas and uploads the image data to GPU
void prepare(Graphics, float, float) Ensures that the canvas image is at least the specified dimensions and cleared to all transparent pixels.
void prepare(Graphics, IDimension) Ensures that the canvas image is at least the specified dimensions and cleared to all transparent pixels.
void renderText(Graphics, Plain) Prepares the canvas and renders the supplied text at 0, 0 using the given config.
void renderText(Graphics, Plain, int, int) Prepares the canvas and renders the supplied text at {@code x, y} using the given config.
 

Changed Methods
ImageLayer layer() Change in return type from playn.core.ImageLayer to playn.scene.ImageLayer.
 Returns the layer that contains our glyph image.
